name: VigiPoolNA
0:
”Alexa, turn BRiO on”
”Alexa, turn off BRiO”
”Alexa, increase BRiO brightness”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your BRiO WiL pool light from Alexa, ask it to dim the brightness or change the lighting sequence.

To control your BRiO WiL, you must first:
1 / Download the BRiO WiL application from the App Store or Google Play
2 / Configure the WiFi access of your BRiO WiL
3 / In the settings, Alexa Settings, create an account and link your BRiO WiL
4 / Click on the VigiPool Skill icon and install it
5 / Your VigiPool credentials will be requested
6 / Once the VigiPool Skill is installed, start the search for devices or ask "Alexa, search for devices"

Here is the list of equipment supported by VigiPool:
- BRiO WiL (v2.30 minimum)

You can turn your BRiO WiL on / off, change the colors and speed of the sequences and change the light intensity.
